characters.name: Donkey Kong
characters.description: The average DK main's dick size is so big that it physically stops them from inputting any sensible buttons. They will be sure to tell you just how many spikes DK has (tell one of them that he only has three and see what happens), and they also make gorilla noises when they SD

characters.name: Luigi
characters.description: Luigi mains throughout history (Netanyahu, Chairman Mao, Hitler...) have always shown a propensity towards war crimes. They may be able to hide it, because they are ultimately successful people, but that grab combo is fascist and so are they

characters.name: Captain Falcon
characters.description: Captain Falcon mains are simple men who enjoy simple pleasures. After all, is there anything more hype than landing a Falcon Punch? You Falcon mains may think you're straight, but take a look at those abs through that skin-tight body suit and those nipple-like buttons and tell me you're not turned on

characters.name: Peach
characters.description: A real Peach main understands that landing JCFF tomahawk grab is better than a good meal, landing drap down up air combos is better than sex, and landing a zero to death turnip combo is so good that you grow weed in your apartment and give it to all your friends with the name 'Turnip Combo'

characters.name: Ice Climbers
characters.description: Ice Climber mains could have invested the time they spent labbing the combos into doing a PhD. Instead of complaining about Nana being useless they could have learned a new skill instead. Instead of going 0-2 they could have just picked up Steve and won but no, Ice Climber mains play Ice Climbers as their one and only hobby

characters.name: Zelda
characters.description: Zelda is the most stunning, beautiful character in the game, and Zelda mains understand that better than anyone else. Zelda mains have an eye for aesthetics, style and fashion. They understand that the inherent beauty behind every smash game must not be soiled by ugly characters

characters.name: Pichu
characters.description: In order to main Pichu you need to be at peace with the fact that life is fleeting and all things pass. At first glance, Pichu mains seem frantic, excitable or dare I say trigger-happy, but deep-down they are prepared to take whatever life dishes out, even if that means losing a stock at 40 to an F-smash

characters.name: Mr. Game & Watch
characters.description: Game and Watch mains are very suspicious. What are they up to? Why did they laugh at that thing I said that wasn't a joke? Are they fishing for a 9? What is their collective agenda? Why play as a character with so few vibes as this

characters.name: Ike
characters.description: Despite Ike being such a gay character, I've never known an Ike main to proudly display queerness in any way. So after thinking about it for a while, I've decided that it must be a repressive masculinity thing. You can at least get a glimpse of the truth by seeing if they play as Top Ike or Bottom Ike (or both!)

characters.name: King Dedede
characters.description: King Dedede mains are here to have fun. They don't even take their pleasure from hitting with the big hammer, they only play the game to enjoy his waddling walk animation, as well as his crouch

characters.name: Olimar
characters.description: Olimar mains are so rare that when you do find one you have to preserve them. They are uniquely skilled in that they can deal with relying on unreliable friends and taking what they are given. They are changeable, adaptable, and dare I say, fickle

characters.name: R.O.B.
characters.description: R.O.B. has little to no good fan-art for a good reason: it's a boring grey robot. R.O.B. mains are either also boring and grey, or they realised that it's much easier to win tournaments with this character than their actual favourite character and are therefore weak traitors to their actual mains

characters.name: Villager
characters.description: At first glance Villager appears innocent, but it's clear that he is a murderer or at the very least a criminal. Villager mains understand this and not only play them, but also vibe with them. Dropping a bowling ball on someone's head, is it cartoon violence or is it revealing a darkness underneath? I would argue that Villager mains themselves grapple with that darkness

characters.name: Wii Fit Trainer
characters.description: The person who saw that Wii Fit Trainer reveal trailer and realised, this is the character for me, is someone who intimately understands the fabric of the universe. They achieve success in smash and in life by drinking water, staying healthy and of course, breathing deeply.

characters.name: Rosalina & Luma
characters.description: Rosalina gameplay is very slow and therefore Rosalina mains are very chill. In their heart there is peace, in their eyes a twinkle of knowing. If they lose, they breathe a sigh of relief and move gracefully on with their lives. If they win, they breathe a sign of relief and move gracefully on with their lives.

characters.name: Mii Brawler
characters.description: Mii Brawler mains are extroverts and popular at school. Yes they may be insufferable but I'm happy to report that they at least have social skills

characters.name: Mii Swordfighter
characters.description: You might think that in terms of vibes, the Mii mains would be somewhat similar, you can imagine a clique in the school playground. But no, Mii Brawler mains are popular kids, Mii Gunner mains are the tech nerds, and Mii Swordfighter mains are the loners who kinda look like if someone would plot to blow up to the school, it might be them

characters.name: Mii Gunner
characters.description: The one Mii Gunner who I know proudly showed me the app they made on their phone which connected to a definitely tournament-illegal controller adapter and which was able to create multiple Mii Gunner specifications in like 20 seconds. Your average Mii Gunner main wouldn't understand why that's so weird

characters.name: Duck Hunt Duo
characters.description: The Duck Hunt main is a 30-something which subverts the common theme of most smash players: they're a financially secure, put-together adult with their shit together. They may be a composed professional during the day, but they have a love of chaos and bullshit which only truly comes out when defeating smash players 10 years younger than them in tournament.

characters.name: Cloud
characters.description: Cloud mains are lacking in social skills. Cloud himself lacks social skills and Cloud mains can really connect with that. Many mains of other characters flirt with Cloud and that's because they are insecure.

characters.name: Corrin
characters.description: Fates may be one of my favourite Fire Emblems but that doesn't mean Corrin isn't the most plain and boring character out there. Corrin mains are even more boring than Corrin because they can't transform into an ugly dragon, which is at the very least a conversation starter

characters.name: Simon
characters.description: A Belmont main who doesn't pick the objectively hotter Richter understands that in order to succeed in smash and in life one must try to resemble He-Man from that 90's cartoon as much as possible. Embrace the ugly, embrace the glory, and spread the vibes across the battlefield

characters.name: Isabelle
characters.description: Isabelle mains play Isabelle solely because she is cute. The gameplay, the fishing rod cheese, the weird match up spread, the tier list, the jab infinite, it's all completely irrelevant for Isabelle mains because she looks so cute in her winter jacket

characters.name: Piranha Plant
characters.description: People who enjoy joke characters are people who are peace with the world. There is no winning or losing in life, there are only fleeting moments of joy for us to cling on to. Piranha Plant mains understand that winning doesn't matter, but experiencing the joy of playing as a potted plant is the only adrenaline kick we need to make it to the end of the smash tournament

characters.name: Min Min
characters.description: Someone who enjoys the game ARMS would probably main Byleth or Mega Man or something. Min Min players couldn't give a shit about ARMS, they only give a shit about destroying their opponent's stocks, and also peace of mind. They take pleasure from watching their opponent's gameplay fall apart through the simple power of Long Punch

characters.name: Steve
characters.description: The average Steve player divides their time between watching Minecraft youtubers, mobile games, Tiktok and school, and is still able to win the local Smash tournament. They have an absolute disregard for honour, fairness, respect or the rules, and would absolutely murder a puppy for a million robux. Some Steve mains also enjoy playing Minecraft

characters.name: Kazuya
characters.description: Kazuya mains are the children who trample over their classmate's sandcastles. They're the people who called you fat at school. As an adult, they will open a rival business across the street and undercut your prices. When you point out that they are shameless, they'll shrug and say, yeah Kazuya's broken
